entry.name: v1
entry.desc: Beginning wavenumber value for performing INTRPL

entry.name: v2
entry.desc: Ending wavenumber value for performing INTRPL

entry.name: iunit
entry.desc: Unit designation of file to be interpolated

entry.name: ifilst
entry.desc: Initial file from IUNIT to be interpolated

entry.name: nifils
entry.desc: Number of files to be interpolated starting at IFILST

entry.name: npts
entry.desc: No. of values printed for begin&end of each panel
